item.title: Windows 7 & RSAT
item.description: I finally found some time today to upgrade my primary work machine to Windows 7 RTM (Yeah). Since I do a lot of system administration one of the first things I put on there was my Powershell tools and RSAT. I went and got the RSAT tools from the MS website, I install it, go into “turn on/off Windows features” menu and click the to level check for RemoteAdministrationTools, in the hope that it would select all the admin tools, but no!
